titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for planning for United States participation in the 2025 World Expo in Osaka, Japan.
A bill to authorize appropriations for planning for United States participation in the 2025 World Expo in Osaka, Japan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes FY2022 activities for planning for U.S. participation in the 2025 World Expo in Osaka, Japan.
